  download_this(
    output_name = "IMDB Data Set",
    output_extension = ".csv",
    button_label = "IMDB Dataset.csv",
    button_type = "default",
    has_icon = TRUE,
    icon = "fa fa-file-csv"
  )

```{r}
library(shiny)

positive <- readLines("positive-words.txt")

ui <- fluidPage(
  downloadButton("downloadPositive", "Download Positive Sentiment Words")
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  output$downloadPositive <- downloadHandler(
    filename = function() {
      "positive-words.txt"
    },
    content = function(file) {
      writeLines(positive, file)
    }
  )
}

shinyApp(ui, server)

```
